so I need to invoke setup.py install again and rebuild pytorch (I am new to using pytorch) Do I need to do anything to clean up the current build? or should I delete the pytorch directory and clone a new version and then run setup.py install ?

body:
so I need to invoke setup.py install again and rebuild pytorch (I am new to
using pytorch)
Do I need to do anything to clean up the current build?
or should I delete the pytorch directory and clone a new version and then
run setup.py install
?


On Fri, Nov 24, 2017 at 6:10 PM, ngimel <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> "6.0 6.1 7.0" if you are not going to run on Maxwell's. "All" will compile
> forever, and produce enormous binaries.
